About

YO This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the source code for the Jekyll new theme at: github.com/jglovier/jekyll-new

You can find the source code for Jekyll at github.com/jekyll/jekyll

Built by hand, using Jekyll, Bourbon, Atom, Emmet and a nice cup of tea
